 17 /**
 18  * Creates a textured quad object.
 19  *
 20  * @class An abstraction for textured quads. Used in the
 21  * {@link bigshot.CSS3DTexturedQuadScene}.
 22  *
 23  * @param {bigshot.Point3D} p the top-left corner of the quad
 24  * @param {bigshot.Point3D} u vector pointing from p along the top edge of the quad
 25  * @param {bigshot.Point3D} v vector pointing from p along the left edge of the quad
 26  * @param {HTMLImageElement} the image to use.
 27  */
 28 bigshot.CSS3DTexturedQuad = function (p, u, v, image) {
 29     this.p = p;
 30     this.u = u;
 31     this.v = v;
 32     this.image = image;
 33 }
 34 
 35 bigshot.CSS3DTexturedQuad.prototype = {
 36     /**
 37      * Computes the cross product of two vectors.
 38      * 
 39      * @param {bigshot.Point3D} a the first vector
 40      * @param {bigshot.Point3D} b the second vector
 41      * @type bigshot.Point3D
 42      * @return the cross product
 43      */
 44     crossProduct : function crossProduct (a, b) {
 45         return {
 46             x : a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y, 
 47             y : a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z, 
 48             z : a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x
 49         };
 50     },
 51     
 52     /**
 53      * Stringifies a vector as the x, y, and z components 
 54      * separated by commas.
 55      * 
 56      * @param {bigshot.Point3D} u the vector
 57      * @type String
 58      * @return the stringified vector
 59      */
 60     vecToStr : function vecToStr (u) {
 61         return (u.x) + "," + (u.y) + "," + (u.z);
 62     },
 63     
 64     /**
 65      * Creates a CSS3D matrix3d transform from 
 66      * an origin point and two basis vectors
 67      * 
 68      * @param {bigshot.Point3D} tl the top left corner
 69      * @param {bigshot.Point3D} u the vector pointing along the top edge
 70      * @param {bigshot.Point3D} y the vector pointing down the left edge
 71      * @type String
 72      * @return the matrix3d statement
 73      */
 74     quadTransform : function quadTransform (tl, u, v) {
 75         var w = this.crossProduct (u, v);
 76         var res = 
 77             "matrix3d(" + 
 78             this.vecToStr (u) + ",0," + 
 79         this.vecToStr (v) + ",0," + 
 80         this.vecToStr (w) + ",0," + 
 81         this.vecToStr (tl) + ",1)";
 82         return res;
 83     },
 84     
 85     /**
 86      * Computes the norm of a vector.
 87      *
 88      * @param {bigshot.Point3D} vec the vector
 89      */
 90     norm : function norm (vec) {
 91         return Math.sqrt (vec.x * vec.x + vec.y * vec.y + vec.z * vec.z);
 92     },
 93     
 94     /**
 95      * Renders the quad.
 96      *
 97      * @param {HTMLElement} world the world element
 98      * @param {number} scale the scale factor to apply to world space to get CSS pixel distances
 99      * @param {bigshot.Point3D} view the viewer position in world space
100      */
101     render : function render (world, scale, view) {
102         var s = scale / (this.image.width - 1);
103         var ps = scale * 1.0;
104         var p = this.p;
105         var u = this.u;
106         var v = this.v;
107         
108         this.image.style.position = "absolute";
109         if (!this.image.inWorld || this.image.inWorld != 1) {
110             world.appendChild (this.image);
111         }
112         this.image.inWorld = 2;
113         this.image.style.WebkitTransformOrigin = "0px 0px 0px";
114         this.image.style.WebkitTransform = 
115             this.quadTransform ({
116                     x : (p.x + view.x) * ps, 
117                     y : (-p.y + view.y) * ps, 
118                     z : (p.z + view.z) * ps
119                 }, {
120                     x : u.x * s, 
121                     y : -u.y * s, 
122                     z : u.z * s
123                 }, {
124                     x : v.x * s, 
125                     y : -v.y * s, 
126                     z : v.z * s
127                 });
128     }
129 }
130
